name: Developer
purpose: Create and maintain software that is a pleasure to work on, while keeping available time in mind
accountabilities: Architecting software, identifying and defining interfaces and modules
Implementing software and corresponding tests using the most suitable technologies and by following the KISS and DRY principles
Thinking through the whole software to identify forgotten use-cases ('edge cases')
Sticking to code style standards and the overall development workflow of the rocket
Supporting other developers to write better code through code reviews and pair coding
Estimating concrete tasks and inform project coordinator early if more time is needed
Knowing the software to keep on giving suggestions and identifying problems with new features

name: Server administrator
purpose: Assist developer and team member in server setup
accountabilities: Supporting project's team into getting the project out in the public
Setting up the needed servers and related tools (DNS,...) for the project to exist
Responding to team questions and provide feedback on the project's need

name: Experienced lookout
purpose: Support developers to make realistic estimates and sustainable architectural decisions
accountabilities: Asking critical questions during estimation and planning of development projects
Providing a long-term view on sustainability of technological and architectural decisions
Helping to identify external interfaces, unknowns and needed explorative work
Helping to define limitations and risky parts that could break the estimations

name: Maintenance guru
purpose: Easen running products through asteroid fields and keep up running products and handle emergency situations
accountabilities: Acting on emergency cases
Understanding scope of emergencies and give according response
Identifying possible sources of problems
Ideating workarounds and implement them
Making sure software stays up to date and communicate it
Reacting on general client feedback and questions
Proactively seeking for new challenges

name: Standard advocate
purpose: Ensure sustainability and maintainability of our development projects and workflows
accountabilities: Staying up to date on current tools, technologies and standards (best practices, workflows, languages, architectures, frameworks, libraries, ...)
Collaborating with business creators and other dev circle roles to stay aligned on needs and wishes within the Rocket
Periodically analysing and updating our tools, technologies and standards to match the Rocket's goals and make the developers' life as easy as possible
On-boarding the development team to new tools, technologies and standards by providing the needed resources

name: Backup carrier
purpose: Keep up to date and safe off-site backups
accountabilities: Keeping backup disks in a safe place outside of the office
Exchanging backup disks regularly

name: Engine mechanist
purpose: Make sure our digital engines keep running and support our crew works
accountabilities: Keeping our network and software tools running during works hour
Making sure our physical servers and computers are working and in a protected environment
Responding to incidents in the infrastructure

name: Crew oracle
purpose: Help the crew troubleshoot issues they are facing when working
accountabilities: Supporting crew members when they are facing issue with their tooling
Improving the documentation around our tooling to help reduce the time to repair
Handling software licenses
